item.title: Java =(
item.dc:creator: @ZA_H ZÃ©H
item.description:
@ZA_H wrote:

Hey, ok compiling is not hard as long as you have a good one.
If yours says you dont have JDK 5 or 6 …(something of that nature)
look for something like

"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java

And since you downloaded JDK 6u11 jsut change it to this.

"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java

Then it should work.

(To edit compiler just right click it and Press “Edit” then notepad will pop up and do like what i said above)

Read full topic

item.title: Java =(
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

Going into more detail on Chassy’s post.

Right click your compiler and choose Edit

Then change the _06 or _07 whatever to _11

Read full topic

item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Edit the path inside your compiler or set your Environmental Variables.
